lead_paragraph: Heather Bresch, the chief executive of Mylan, which raised the price of EpiPens, is the daughter of Senator Joe Manchin III of West Virginia.

headline.print_headline: Awkward Target for Lawmakers Outraged by EpiPen Prices: A Senator’s Daughter
headline.main: Awkward Target for Outrage Over EpiPen: A Senator’s Daughter

snippet: Heather Bresch, the chief executive of Mylan, which raised the price of EpiPens, is the daughter of Senator Joe Manchin III of West Virginia....
abstract: Senators wanting explanation of soaring cost of allergies injection device EpiPen find awkward target in Mylan chief executive Heather Bresch, who is daughter of Sen Joe Manchin III of West Virginia.
